\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{index:get--users-(int-user_id)-posts-(tag)}\pysiglinewithargsret{\bfcode{GET~}\bfcode{/users/}}{\strong{int: }\emph{user\_id}}{\bfcode{/posts/}}{\emph{tag}}{}
The posts tagged with \emph{tag} that the user (\emph{user\_id}) wrote.

\textbf{Example request}:

\begin{Verbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n+nf}{GET} \PYG{n+nn}{/users/123/posts/web} \PYG{k+kr}{HTTP}\PYG{o}{/}\PYG{l+m}{1.1}
\PYG{n+na}{Host}\PYG{o}{:} \PYG{l}{example.com}
\PYG{n+na}{Accept}\PYG{o}{:} \PYG{l}{application/json, text/javascript}
\end{Verbatim}

\textbf{Example response}:

\begin{Verbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{k+kr}{HTTP}\PYG{o}{/}\PYG{l+m}{1.1} \PYG{l+m}{200} \PYG{n+ne}{OK}
\PYG{n+na}{Vary}\PYG{o}{:} \PYG{l}{Accept}
\PYG{n+na}{Content\PYGZhy{}Type}\PYG{o}{:} \PYG{l}{text/javascript}

\PYG{p}{[}
  \PYG{p}{\PYGZob{}}
    \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}post\PYGZus{}id\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{o}{:} \PYG{l+m+mi}{12345}\PYG{p}{,}
    \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}author\PYGZus{}id\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{o}{:} \PYG{l+m+mi}{123}\PYG{p}{,}
    \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}tags\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{o}{:} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}server\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{,} \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}web\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{]}\PYG{p}{,}
    \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}subject\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{o}{:} \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}I tried Nginx\PYGZdq{}}
  \PYG{p}{\PYGZcb{}}\PYG{p}{,}
  \PYG{p}{\PYGZob{}}
    \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}post\PYGZus{}id\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{o}{:} \PYG{l+m+mi}{12346}\PYG{p}{,}
    \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}author\PYGZus{}id\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{o}{:} \PYG{l+m+mi}{123}\PYG{p}{,}
    \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}tags\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{o}{:} \PYG{p}{[}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}html5\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{,} \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}standards\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{,} \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}web\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{]}\PYG{p}{,}
    \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}subject\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{o}{:} \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}We go to HTML 5\PYGZdq{}}
  \PYG{p}{\PYGZcb{}}
\PYG{p}{]}
\end{Verbatim}
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Query Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\textbf{\texttt{sort}} -- one of \code{hit}, \code{created-at}

\item {} 
\textbf{\texttt{offset}} -- offset number. default is 0

\item {} 
\textbf{\texttt{limit}} -- limit number. default is 30

\end{itemize}

\item[{Request Headers}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\href{http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec14.html\#sec14.1}{Accept} -- the response content type depends on
\emph{\texttt{Accept}} header

\item {} 
\href{http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec14.html\#sec14.8}{Authorization} -- optional OAuth token to authenticate

\end{itemize}

\item[{Response Headers}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\href{http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec14.html\#sec14.17}{Content-Type} -- this depends on \emph{\texttt{Accept}}
header of request

\end{itemize}

\item[{Status Codes}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\href{http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec10.html\#sec10.2.1}{200 OK} -- no error

\item {} 
\href{http://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec10.html\#sec10.4.5}{404 Not Found} -- there's no user

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}
